name: periwinkle
content:
periwinkle noun
(PLANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an evergreen plant (= one that never loses its leaves) with small, blue flowers: A few periwinkle plants poked out of the waste ground. Periwinkle is said to ease toothache.
Alesikka/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

periwinkle noun
(SEA ANIMAL)
[ C ] US (UK winkle) a small sea snail that can be eaten: He made her periwinkles in champagne sauce. Turtles protect the wetlands by eating periwinkles, marine snails that consume marsh grass.
Paul Kay/ Oxford Scientific/GettyImages

periwinkle noun
(COLOUR)
[ U ] (also periwinkle blue) a pale purple-blue colour: The fabric has flecks of peach, green, and periwinkle. The colour of this flower is similar to the periwinkle blue of the rosemary.
